name: OMEGA PATTERN - VISUAL NOVEL
description: Omega Pattern is a Visual Novel which offers a variable multiple-choice decision system. This means that both the number of decision points and the number of choices or options that you will find in those decision points may vary according to your previous decisions during the game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Pentium 4 2.1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Please, try the free demo before purchasing. Thanks.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
